## Funding

This project is funded by the [Digital and Data Literacy in Teaching Lab (DDLitLab)](https://www.isa.uni-hamburg.de/en/ddlitlab.html), an initiative by the [ISA-Zentrum](https://www.isa.uni-hamburg.de/) at the [University of Hamburg](https://www.uni-hamburg.de/en.html).
The Digital and Data Literacy in Teaching Lab program is in turn funded by the [Stiftung Innovation in der Hochschullehre](https://stiftung-hochschullehre.de/en/) (details can be found [here](https://stiftung-hochschullehre.de/projekt/ddlitlab/)).

Our project proposal can be found [here]({{< var links.proposal >}}) (in German).

Special thanks to [Carolin Scharfenberg](https://www.isa.uni-hamburg.de/en/ddlitlab/team/scharfenberg-carolin.html){target="_blank"} as well as [Moritz Kreinsen](https://www.isa.uni-hamburg.de/en/ddlitlab/team/kreinsen-moritz.html) and [SÃ¶ren-Kristian Berger](https://www.isa.uni-hamburg.de/en/ddlitlab/team/berger-soeren-kristian.html) for help with project coordination, administration, and the grant application process.
